Our story (the bitesize version) Every day, we deliver delicious food to millions of customers around the world. Having expanded as Just Eat Takeaway.com, we now operate in 24 countries and 5 continents, with more than 200,000 restaurants on our roster. As a growing global company, our integration needs to run smoothly across all business areas and international markets – from the Netherlands to New Zealand.  All about the role As Manager Ancillary Revenues Analytics within the central data & analytics team, you will be focusing on creation of data and standardized tool so that functional analysts in the Ancillary Revenues department can focus on insight generation. You will have your own Analysts and Data Engineers who report to you so that you can scale this creation work. You work with the other members in the Leadership Team of the Central Data & Analytics organisation which is setup in a hub and spoke model with a dedicated central team to ensure local agility but with a central governance setup. Another important part is the support to the management team. Key projects could arise and become part of the role. Last but not least, you will get in touch with your main stakeholders which are the members in the Ancillary Revenues department. Ancillary Revenues is responsible for creating new sources of revenue. Promoted Placement and Top Rank are the main products. In this varied role, we're counting on you to: Making sure the quality of data by building / maintaining queries in data warehouse, plus by performing periodic data audit activity to resolve mismatch and discrepancies Develop / maintain standardized tools such as default reports which is used across company, with again making sure the quality of data shown on it Prioritize tasks together with functional analysts and manage projects according to the priority Report to the Lead of Sales Analytics, and also to the director of Ancillary Revenues Communicate to any other type of stakeholders inside and outside of companies to move things forward Maintain data dictionary to speak the same language Support hiring process for functional / country analysts Provide training to business users to promote data driven way of decision making  Can you deliver… Here are the skills we need from our Manager: 6+ years' experience in an analytics or BI role related in Financial analysis or Revenue analytics Team Management as well as project management experience A natural collaborator with excellent communication skills - build bridges Able to translate business requirements/requests into a technical approach A proactive, data-driven and logical mindset Fluent English language skills (written & spoken)  Here is our offer Your skills and our great rewards belong together. That means you'll enjoy: Competitive salary A varied and impactful role with the opportunity to grow A dynamic, international workplace in Amsterdam Fantastic company and team events A pension plan in which we pay 60% 26 days of holiday per year Office amenities: Delicious tea & coffee, fresh fruit, our popular Friday drinks…and more (temporarily unavailable) A budget for ordering lunches and a working-from-home allowance Ready to take on this exciting role? Click Apply Now to send us your CV!

title: Big Data Analyst
summary:
Voor een onafhankelijk adviesbureau, gevestigd in een prachtig pand in het Vondelpark, zoeken wij big data analysten.
Salary: €2,700.00 - €4,200.00 per month.
description: Wil jij Big Data Analytics inzetten om HR te optimaliseren? Voor een onafhankelijk adviesbureau, gevestigd in een prachtig pand in het Vondelpark, zoeken wij big data analysten. Bedrijfsomschrijving Onze opdrachtgever helpt organisaties om de HR kosten omlaag te brengen. Ze hebben klanten binnen de Fortune top 500 in farmaceutische industrie, financiële sector, vliegtuigmaatschappijen en producenten in 70 verschillende landen. Met brede kennis van de industrie, geavanceerde methodieken en software, weten zij hun klanten inzicht te geven hoe zij hun bedrijfsvoering kunnen verbeteren ten op zichten van concurrenten. Op het Amsterdamse kantoor hebben zij 15 medewerkers in dienst en 120 FTE wereldwijd. Functieomschrijving Je gebruikt R of Excel om conclusies te trekken en het juiste advies te kunnen geven aan klanten zodat zij de HR-bedrijfsvoering kunnen optimaliseren. Je kunt hierbij denken aan optimaliseren van vluchtroutes, advies over salarissen en beloningen, welke activiteiten een werkgever dient te nemen naar aanleiding van de covid-19 pandemie en hoe organisaties zich beter kunnen profileren op het gebied van diversiteit. Functie-eisen · Master in Business Analytics of Econometrics · Analytisch met grote interesse in Big Data · Kennis of ervaring met R of Excel is een pre · Uitstekend in de Nederlandse en Engelse taal Beloning · Inhouse training · Maandsalaris van 2700 · 8% vakantiegeld · 10% bonus · 25 vakantiedagen · Internationale werkomgeving Ben jij de leergierige analyst die niet weg is van een uitdaging? Stuur je CV en motivatiebrief naar www.humancapital.nl of bel Jan Andries Stam op 0206142711. Job Type: Full-time Salary: €2,700.00 - €4,200.00 per month Work Remotely: Temporarily due to COVID-19

title: Business Analyst
summary:
Be the owner for any data interfaces such as Looker, Zendesk and Salesforce to help our Support teams with relevant data insights.
We can't wait to meet you.
description: This is Adyen We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company, building a platform from scratch. Today, we're the payments platform of choice for the world's brightest companies. Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives. This diversity, of backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives, is essential in helping us maintain our momentum. Our business challenges are unique, we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them - voices like yours. So no matter where you're from, who you love, or what you believe in, we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen. Business Analyst We are looking for a Business Analyst to join our Support team in Amsterdam. In this role you will be working together with the Global Support team to build dashboards, expand our knowledge on customer data and improve the way we look at providing the best customer experience. What you'll do Identify the necessary data required to address questions, extract the required data and perform analysis on Global Support metrics Be the owner for any data interfaces such as Looker, Zendesk and Salesforce to help our Support teams with relevant data insights Work closely with the Zendesk product owner and build dashboards to support business decisions based on the analytics from the Support organization Write LookML code for defining the way the tables are joined behind the scenes for optimizing Looker dashboard building Writing ad-hoc queries in SQL for answering specific questions You may also act as the owner/lead for other tools used within the operational teams Who you are You are a self-starter, with perseverance and a can-do attitude You enjoy a fast-paced environment and skilled in structuring the unstructured You have strong project management skills and able to clearly organize, structure and prioritize work You have a strong delivery and work ethos, and always follows up You feel comfortable writing queries in SQL You have experience with BI tools (Looker and Zendesk Explore specifically are a plus) Excellent in communication of complex data or technical functionality with commercial or client teams You get a sense of achievement from solving problems, and from helping people; a great customer experience is at the heart of what you do You love to work in an international environment, and to build relationships with global and multicultural teams Who we are Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world's leading companies, delivering frictionless payments across online, mobile and in-store channels. It is the only provider of a modern end-to-end infrastructure, connecting directly to Visa, Mastercard, and consumers' globally preferred payment methods. With offices around the world, Adyen serves nine of the 10 largest U.S. internet companies and many worldwide retailers. Customers include Facebook, Uber, L'Oreal, Evernote, Cathay Pacific and Spotify. We offer a competitive salary, knowledge sharing internal events, exchange program to other offices and great career opportunities. Become part of an international work environment and take your career to the next level! Ready to meet us? If this role looks like your next challenge, apply by clicking the link below. We can't wait to meet you

title: Werkstudent zomeranalist
summary:
Een kickstart wil geven aan je carrière als financieel analist.
We geloven in de kracht van data en in onze mensen.
Deze vacature is perfect voor jou als je.
description: Deze vacature is perfect voor jou als je  Een kickstart wil geven aan je carrière als financieel analist. Van 17 mei tot eind augustus zoeken wij verschillende werkstudent zomeranalisten die ons team komen versterken. Dit is de kans om naast, of net na, je studie waardevolle ervaring op te doen bij een succesvolle data gedreven scale-up. Wil jij waarde toevoegen aan je cv en vaardigheden ontwikkelen voor de rest van je carrière? Lees vooral verder.  Full-time · Amsterdam  Annual Insight ANNUALINSIGHT verzamelt en analyseert grote hoeveelheden openbare data over bedrijven en markten en vertaalt deze voor klanten tot direct toepasbare inzichten in abonnementsvorm – bijvoorbeeld over concurrenten, groeimarkten en leveranciersrisico. Onze cultuur is jong en informeel, met veel ruimte voor groei en nieuwe ideeën. Ondanks ons succes zijn we altijd op zoek naar verbetering en innovatie van onze dienstverlening. We geloven in de kracht van data en in onze mensen. Werken bij ons betekent een rol vol mogelijkheden waarbij wij een beroep doen op je creativiteit en ambitie om te groeien. Als scale-up bieden wij je een platform om een kickstart aan je carrière te geven maar ook de ruimte om als professional met ons mee te groeien. Het team Je maakt deel uit van een team van andere junior analisten, analisten & senior analisten en je rapporteert direct aan de manager Public & Health (P&H). Dagelijks sta je in contact met je team en gedurende de week zijn er meerdere schakelmomenten met het gehele bedrijf, of individueel tijdens een (Covid-proof) koffierondje! De baan Als zomeranalist zal je direct meedraaien in de operatie binnen de P&H sector. Jouw werkzaamheden zullen met name bestaan uit het doorlichten van (zorg)bedrijven in verschillende regio’s aan de hand van jaarrekeningen. Daarnaast ben jij medeverantwoordelijk voor de invoer van data in ons centraal platform, het product waardoor wij zo succesvol zijn geworden. Als team levert iedereen zijn contributie om uiteindelijk de eind-klant, veelal strategische besluitvormers binnen gemeentes of zorginstellingen, van de juiste inzichten te voorzien. Wij zorgen voor jou Goed salaris Dynamische en succesvolle scale-up De kans om waarde toe te voegen aan je cv Informele en goede werksfeer met allerlei teamuitjes & borrels (helaas niet altijd in de vorm zoals wij willen zien dankzij Covid) Een platform om je carrière een kick-start te geven. Je zal namelijk een bijdrage leveren aan het oplossen van strategisch financiële vraagstukken. Wie zoeken wij? Wij zoeken ambitieuze, analytisch zeer sterke, ondernemende starters of studenten die richting het einde van de studie zitten met een universitaire achtergrond. Wij zijn op zoek naar jou als je: Een universitaire Bachelor / Master aan het afronden bent (bij voorkeur richting economie / bedrijfskunde) Goede studieresultaten hebt behaald Een sterk analytisch denker bent Gek bent op (financiële) getallen Beschikt over zeer goede schriftelijke vaardigheden in het Nederlands Je beschikbaar bent tussen 17 mei en 31 augustus voor 5 tot minimaal 4 dagen per week Verras jij ons door je frisse energie en mentaliteit? Dan kunnen we altijd de opties bespreken om na je werkstudent schap in vaste dienst te komen. Het sollicitatieproces Deze vacature sluit op vrijdag 16 april. Streven is om in de week van 26 april t/m 1 mei de gesprekken te voeren. Dit zal uit een case interview bestaan van ongeveer 1,5 uur. Voorafgaand aan dit gesprek vragen wij je een capaciteiten test te maken, dit kan uiteraard digitaal. Vragen? Neem dan contact op met onze recruiter, Hilbert van Alphen, via hilbert.van.alphen@annual-insight.nl of stuur hem een bericht via LinkedIn. Acquisitie? Liever niet :) En nu? Heb jij net als wij een grenzeloze ambitie en wil je aan de slag bij een innovatieve scale-up met veel mogelijkheden? Reageer dan direct en we nemen snel contact met je op!

title: Senior Analyst: Data Acquisition and Insights
summary:
Are you our next data analyst?
Work closely with colleagues in a talented team of developers, data analysts and data engineers.
26 days of holiday per year.
description: Are you a skilled analyst who can offer insights to support the growth of a global business? Want to work with the latest technology in a fast-paced, international environment? Then keep reading… Our story  Every day, we serve food-lovers from Amsterdam to Auckland. Having expanded as Just Eat Takeaway.com, we're active in 24 countries worldwide, serving over 50 million active users. With a huge global customer base, data plays a vital role in our continued growth and innovation. All about the role  As our Senior Analyst: Data Acquisition and Insights, you're comfortable analysing complex big data systems. Driving our data acquisition project, you collect vast amounts of open data from multiple sources. Your aim is to support the Sales department and Management with strategic insights and operational tools to optimise our product offering.  Playing a key role in our Strategic Data Acquisition team, you perform analysis of the performance of our data acquisition technology, as well as the valuable data we acquire through it. Using your expertise in acquisition technology, you can ensure that we maintain the highest data quality standards – enabling the business to make data-driven decisions.  In this role, it's also your responsibility to: Analyse our complex data acquisition systems Develop automated & advanced data quality monitoring systems to proactively detect issues Work closely with colleagues in a talented team of developers, data analysts and data engineers Interpret data, analyse results & provide ongoing reports using Tableau Improve and maintain existing Tableau reports to effectively meet business needs Maintain data mart tables for reporting and analysis purposes Proactively analyse data to locate new insights and offer great ideas for improvement Can you deliver…  Are you our next data analyst? Here are the skills and experience we're looking for: 5+ years' experience in analytics roles 5+ years' experience in data visualisation using Tableau, or a similar tool Extensive experience in SQL, preferably including Redshift, Postgresql Skilled in finding creative and practical solutions to complex problems Experience working with large and complex datasets is a big advantage Fluent English (written & spoken) and good communication skills Here is our offer  Like the perfect food pairing, your expertise and our great rewards belong together: Competitive salary A wide-ranging and impactful data analytics role, with global scope A dynamic, welcoming workplace at our Amsterdam HQ (when you're in the office) A pension plan in which we pay 60% 26 days of holiday per year Budget for internal & external training and conferences Working from home allowance and a budget for ordering lunches Are you the amazing analyst we're looking for? Click Apply Now and send us your CV!

title: Traineeship IT-Audit
summary:
Affiniteit met cijfers en data.
Je krijgt bij ons naast intensieve ‘training on the job’ de kans om je door middel van gerichte opleidingen en trainingen te…
description: Word jij onze nieuwe CROP-er? Wij zijn op zoek naar een trainee voor het team IT-audit. Heb jij een passie voor IT en Accountancy? En wil je graag leren?Dan zijn we op zoek naar jou!  Wat ga je doen: Als trainee ondersteun je de controlepraktijk bij jaarrekeningcontroles en ISAE opdrachten. Daarnaast help je mee met het uitbouwen van onze praktijk. Je wordt enthousiast van het doorgronden van IT-omgevingen en de bijbehorende datastromen.  Je krijgt bij ons naast intensieve ‘training on the job’ de kans om je door middel van gerichte opleidingen en trainingen te bekwamen als IT auditor / data analist. Wij zijn op zoek naar iemand die zich graag wil laten opleiden tot IT-auditor. Het volgen van de RE of CISA opleiding behoort op termijn tot de mogelijkheden. Kortom de kans om je verder te ontwikkelen! Je komt te werken in een informele omgeving waar zelfontplooiing, werkplezier en carrièrekansen centraal staan. Je standplaats is flexibel en stemmen wij af op je woonplaats, want bij CROP vinden wij een goede balans tussen werk en vrije tijd belangrijk.  Jij beschikt over: Een (bijna) afgeronde HBO of WO-opleiding op het gebied van, digital business and innovation,accountancy, informatica of een vergelijkbare opleiding Een sterk analytisch vermogen Affiniteit met cijfers en data Brede interesse in alles wat met IT te maken heeft Open, assertief en communicatief Ervaring met Power BI, SSIS, SQL, ACL/Idea is een pré, enthousiasme een must!

title: Business Data Analist
summary:
Ervaring met data-intensieve projecten, b.v. datawarehousing of data lakes;
Het definiëren van data governance processen en samen met het scrum-team oplossingen…
description: Category: Analytics and Emerging Digital Technologies City: Utrecht, Utrecht, Netherlands Position ID: J1220-1373 Employment Type: Full Time Position Description: Data Governance is essentieel bij een efficiënt, gestructureerd en betrouwbaar Enterprise Data Lake. Ter versterking van ons Data Lake team zijn wij momenteel op zoek naar Business Analisten (Data Governance en Data Management), die ervaring hebben met een breed scala aan Data onderwerpen zoals ETL, security, governance, privacy en datakwaliteit.  Wat ga je doen? De Business Data Analist is verantwoordelijk voor: Het definiëren van data governance processen en samen met het scrum-team oplossingen ontwerpen voor dataretentie, data privacy (privacy by design), data lineage en datakwaliteit De implementatie en het gebruik van data lake/warehouse tooling De verfijning en verbetering van het data governance proces  Wat breng je mee? Je past adviesvaardigheden toe en en zoekt samenwerking op met andere belanghebbenden bij het definiëren van de juiste data governance processen voor een enterprise wide cloud data platform. Daarnaast:  Heb je een relevante afgeronde hbo/wo-opleiding (Informatica, Informatiekunde of Bedrijfskundige richting); Heb je gedegen kennis van datamanagementprocessen. Ervaring met data-intensieve projecten, b.v. datawarehousing of data lakes; Ben je instaat om het belang van Data Governance enthousiast over te dragen aan anderen; Kan je werken met dataplatforms zoals Cloudera Hadoop, Hortonworks Data Flow Cluster (HDF), Informatica Big Data Management, Enterprise Data Catalog; Heb je ervaring met data protection/masking oplossingen en tools; ervaring met datakwaliteitsoplossingen op een cloud platform (Azure) is een pré; Heb je kennis en ervaring in de financiële sector (pré); Ben je bekend met GDPR (AVG); Ben je leergierig en bereid om zich continu te verbeteren in een flexibele en dynamische DevOps omgeving; Heb je uitstekende communicatieve en sociale vaardigheden en een goede beheersing van zowel de Nederlandse als de Engelse taal; Ben je woonachtig in Nederland.  Ons aanbod? Een vaste baan en de mogelijkheid om aandeelhouder te worden en zo mee te delen in onze successen. Zo wordt werken bij CGI dubbel beloond. Via de CGI Academy de juiste trainingen te volgen, want jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling vinden wij belangrijk en staat bij ons voorop. Een plek in onze hechte community waar we samen met elkaar de verantwoordelijkheid van projecten dragen en klantverwachtingen overtreffen. Een rol in ons CGI verhaal.  “Wij willen het beste uit jou halen! Are you ready to Be part of our story?"  Waar kom je terecht? Als Business Data Analist kom je te werken voor de unit Banking binnen de sector Financial Services. Binnen Financial Services erkennen leiders van banken, verzekeringsmaatschappijen en pensioenfondsen dat de implementatie van wet- en regelgeving, parallel aan de digitale transformatie, invloed heeft op de hele organisatie en alle bedrijfsdomeinen.  De bancaire markt verandert in snel tempo. Daar waar de markt vroeger tot een select aantal banken toebehoorde is het speelveld nu veel meer open. Tegelijk is er een grote druk op kosten, het aantrekken van klanten en het voldoen aan wet- en regelgeving. Een complexe markt, die vraagt om andere business modellen en innovatieve oplossingen. Daarom is de bancaire sector ‘the place to be’ voor elke ambitieuze en betrokken ICT’er die wil werken met de nieuwste technieken. CGI bedient de top van het Nederlandse bankwezen. Samen met meer dan 16.000 ervaren professionals wereldwijd bieden wij de banken en financiële dienstverleners een breed portfolio aan services en oplossingen: van consultancy en systeemintegratie tot applicatiemanagement en IT- en business process outsourcing  Interesse? Solliciteer direct! We nemen dan zo snel mogelijk contact met je op. Vragen over de functie? Stel ze aan Mario in den Haak via mario.in.den.haak@cgi.com of (06) 10 31 25 80. Voor meer informatie over de sollicitatieprocedure kun je terecht bij Chris Nikijuluw, corporate recruiter via 06-204 511 05 of via chris.nikijuluw@cgi.com.  Wij werken niet samen met externe partijen. Acquisitie wordt daarom niet op prijs gesteld. What you can expect from us: Bouw met ons aan je carrière  Het is een bijzondere tijd binnen de wereld van IT, de digitale transformatie zit in een versnelling. CGI heeft een schat aan kennis en praktische ervaring op het gebied van digitale transformatie. Zo helpen wij onze klanten belangrijke stappen te zetten op de weg naar hun digitale transformatie en bieden we onze professionals uitdagende carrièremogelijkheden.  Ons succes is gebaseerd op het talent en de betrokkenheid van onze professionals. Samen, als één team, staan we voor de uitdagingen en delen we de beloningen die gepaard gaan met de groei van CGI. Dit versterkt het gevoel van eigenaarschap, want al onze professionals delen mee in de waarde die wij gezamenlijk creëren.  Kom werken bij CGI én bouw samen met ons aan een van de grootste, onafhankelijke, IT en zakelijke dienstverleners ter wereld.  Bezoek voor meer informatie over CGI: www.cginederland.nl  Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld.  Wij bieden onze professionals een gelijkwaardige behandeling en gelijke carrièrekansen.  Meer informatie of vragen over de sollicitatieprocedure? Neem hiervoor contact op met de afdeling Recruitment via (088) 564 00 00.

title: Chemisch analist voedingsmiddelenindustrie Amsterdam
summary:
De data van de chemische analyses uitwerken volgens ISO normen.
Voor een organisatie binnen de voedingsmiddelenindustrie zal jij als analist bezig zijn met het…
description: Chemical analist Laboratorium QC Voor een organisatie binnen de voedingsmiddelenindustrie zal jij als analist bezig zijn met het uitvoeren van zowel chemische als fysische analyses op voeding. De doelen hebben dan ook betrekking tot de veiligheid, kwaliteit, leverbetrouwbaarheid en de kosten van voedsel? Werk jij graag mee aan deze doelen? Dan past deze rol goed bij jou. Bedrijf Het betreft een laboratorium binnen de voedingsmiddelenindustrie. Binnen dit bedrijf dien je analytische problemen op te lossen. Het gaat om een klein chemisch team waardoor er een informele sfeer hangt. Functieomschrijving Binnen deze rol ben jij voor de volgende werkzaamheden verantwoordelijk: Het valideren en optimaliseren van chemische testen Het gebruik van analysemethoden waaronder GC(MS), HPLC, FTIR, UV/VIS De data van de chemische analyses uitwerken volgens ISO normen Valideren van ijklijnen ten behoeven van essentiële meetapparatuur Profiel Als QC Specialist beschik je dan ook over: Een afgeronde MBO4/HBO opleiding (binnen levensmiddelen) Minimaal 1 jaar werkervaring met chemische analyses Kennis van een LIMS systeem Vloeiend in Nederlands en Engels Aanbod Je werkt in een 3-ploegendienst Een salaris tussen €1.800,- en €2.500,- per maand excl. 32% ploegentoeslag Doorgroeimogelijkheden in een klein team 13e maand 25 vakantiedagen Contact Heb jij interesse in de functie of wil je andere mogelijkheden bespreken? Neem dan contact op met Soraya Hamria via 020 - 7979825 of solliciteer meteen door jouw CV en motivatiebrief naar te sturen.  BBBH83822_161313512884593

title: Freelance PIM Business Analist
summary: From developing marketing campaigns and analyzing customer data, to building a completely new E-commerce platform - they do it all.
description: Customer is king. We all know it. Especially nowadays, in the age of the internet. Your wildest dreams are just a click away with the ‘add to shopping cart’ button. All we really need now is for it all to work smoothly, reliably, consistently and at scale. Sounds easy? Great, then you’re the person we’re looking for. Tell me more… With the global rise of E-commerce and a whole host of new media platforms that can be used to sell products, buying a product has never been so complex. Back in the days you would simply go to a store, grab a product, drop some money on the counter and that was that. Nowadays, there are more stores than you can count, selling more products than you can imagine, and offering more payment options than you can fathom. Selling a product is infinitely more complex than it used to be. Fortunately, there’s one company working to make buying stuff, easy again. By combining one of the world’s leading marketing agencies with one of the world’s leading digital agencies, it has become the one-stop-shop for all things e-commerce. From developing marketing campaigns and analyzing customer data, to building a completely new E-commerce platform - they do it all. Great, so what do they need from me? They need your help to build the future of online retail. You’ll work closely together with a multi-disciplinary team consisting of Engineers, Customer Experience specialists, developers, and an Architect. Your goal? To help some of the world’s biggest brands move and improve their business online. We know it sounds a little abstract but that’s because the role is so diverse. From helping a major sneaker brand completely redesign their E-commerce platform to service millions of customers, to building the advanced analytics environment where all the customer data is analyzed. Sounds cool but what can I bring? It almost goes without saying that a few years of PIM/PXM experience (Salsify or Riversand is preferred) will come in handy. As will experience in integration projects with complex business lines, complex product structures, complex interfacing, different locales and different languages. Beyond that, it’s all up to you. Of course, it might be niceif you also possess excellent analytical skills and the ability to understand complex product structures and complex business processes. Also know a thing or two about enterprise commerce solutions like Intershop or Magento but the most important thing is your ability to communicate and keep learning. Contract Startdate: ASAPContract duration: 4 monthsOption to extend: YesMax. rate: €85

title: Business Analyst
summary:
A passion for turning data into valuable information.
You are part of a customer journey team which exists of a product owner, digital marketeers, developers,…
description: Share your passion for tech, innovation and performance! LeasePlan Digital are the digital enablers within LeasePlan, one of the world largest leasing organizations, active in 32 countries. What are you going to do? Analysing and modelling business processes (process flows) both As Isas well as To Be processes Based on the processes, help in capturing, translation and implementation of business needs (requirements Defining these requirements in a SMART way and track progress on delivery of the requirements Be a bridge between the business and supporting departments Assist in the creation of user stories and acceptance criteria Own the user stories in Jira What do you need to do the job? The confidence to speak up when something can be done better or smarter and the ability to accept compromises when necessary. Understand the current and future customer needs across various steps in the customer journey. A passion for turning data into valuable information. Ability to interact with technical resources and effectively communicate technical information and processes to relevant stakeholders. Working experience in integrations of backend with front end solutions. Knowledge of the process modeling method BPMN (Business Process Model and Notation) Working experience with Atlassian (Confluence, Jira), Slack and Gitlab. Bachelor's or Master's degree, preferably in business, information systems, marketing, computer science, or other relevant areas. You are: An energetic self-starter. Result driven. An excellent communicator and strong in international relationship management. Passionate and always looking for improvements. The team You are part of a customer journey team which exists of a product owner, digital marketeers, developers, data engineers and scientists. Working from Amsterdam this team is transforming the on-boarding of clients into a fully digital process. What LeasePlan does We keep people on the move. We do this in more 32 countries by obsessively focusing on how people get from A to B. And by developing and marketing the ultimate digital solution that enables an unlimited variety of driving and transport options. LeasePlan keeps people on the move. Giving them the freedom to go wherever they want. With any car, anytime, anywhere. That's only possible if we listen. And this is what drives us. What do we offer? A challenging job where you work on a product that is rolled out worldwide. Besides, it is an inspiring environment that is always in motion. Your workplace will be in a beautiful new office in Amsterdam and last but not least the opportunity to develop yourself in a growing international environment, with an appropriate salary and excellent secondary employment conditions.

title: Designer
summary:
Minimaal twee tot vijf jaar ervaring met data-analyse, data-ontwerp en/of dataconversie.
Om dit te bereiken zijn we op zoek naar een analist-ontwerper…
description: Over Data eXcellence  DX is een IT-bedrijf met vestigingen in Nieuwegein en Groningen, 100% gefocust op datamigratie. DX biedt medewerkers groei, inspiratie, uitdaging en de mogelijkheid deel uit te maken van een snelgroeiende organisatie met een geweldig team! DX heeft de ambitie om de datamigratiepartij van Europa te worden. Om dit te bereiken zijn we op zoek naar een analist-ontwerper datamigratie.  We leveren altijd 100% kwaliteit. 100% is belangrijk voor onze klanten, en zeker ook voor onze medewerkers. We halen altijd het beste uit onszelf en zoeken continu naar verbeteringen.  We geloven dat werk leuk moet zijn. Contacten met je collega’s vormen hierin de basis. We doen veel gezamenlijk - zo lunchen we bijvoorbeeld elke dag samen.  Designer  Als designer los je samen met onze architecten, software engineers en andere analist-ontwerpers complexe migratievraagstukken op. Om dit te realiseren communiceer je actief met de klant en collega’s om de betekenis van data te achterhalen en de juiste transformatie van de data van het bronsysteem naar het doelsysteem te beschrijven.  Je bent in staat zonder al te veel documentatie een compleet datamodel op te leveren van bron- en doelsystemen. Vervolgens maak je het ontwerp: de mapping van de gegevens. Dit ontwerp wordt gebruikt om de datamigratie te realiseren.  Je begeleidt de realisatie van het ontwerp dat jij gemaakt hebt. Je blijft het inhoudelijke aanspreekpunt voor de klant tot en met de productieconversie.  Wat wij bieden Groei mee in onze snelgroeiende organisatie - in techniek, functionele kennis of management We innoveren continu en iedereen doet mee. Je werkt met de beste mensen uit het vak De uitdaging is de combinatie van groot belang voor de klant, hoge complexiteit en 100% kwaliteit. Het foutloos migreren van 30 miljard euro pensioencontracten is een mooi voorbeeld hiervan Uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden en een gezonde balans tussen werk en vrije tijd. WO of HBO werk- en denkniveau Minimaal twee tot vijf jaar ervaring met data-analyse, data-ontwerp en/of dataconversie Kennis van en ervaring met datamodelleren en SQL Doorgronden van complexe datamodellen Goed begrip voor de business van de klant Nauwkeurig, analytisch, communicatief en praktisch Wat jij biedt Interesse?  Voel jij je aangesproken? Herken jij je in het profiel en voldoe je aan de functie-eisen? Dan hebben wij een topfunctie voor je in ons groeiende bedrijf met aansprekende projecten en klanten.  Reageer direct door het formulier hiernaast in te vullen.  Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature stellen wij niet op prijs.

title: Senior Database Developer
summary:
Interpret data using a variety of techniques, ranging from simple data aggregation via statistical analysis to complex data mining.
Temporarily due to COVID-19.
description: Modis have an excellent opportunity for a Database Developer, the successful applicant will be seconded to our air traffic control client located near Maastricht. Please note, only applicants from an EU member state can be considered. Modis is a specialised IT & Engineering consultancy with more than 30 years’ experience providing consultants to our key partners in The Netherlands. Currently we are recruiting a Databse Developer for our air traffic control client located in Maastricht. This opportunity is initially for 1 year with the possibility to extend for a further 2 years after at this particular client. Following this project your employment with Modis could progress for many years based on our client portfolio. The role is best suited to applicants with 5+ years Database Development Experience. The Objective of the role: Is to provide the service of one business dashboard developer to support the PABI project team with design, development, verification, deployment, documentation and maintenance efforts of post-OPS analysis and other business dashboards. You will be required to develop and maintain post-ops analysis and other business dashboards. Closely work with business units to turn their requirements and sandbox data analytics into sustainable and reliable governed dashboard products. Interpret data using a variety of techniques, ranging from simple data aggregation via statistical analysis to complex data mining. Design, develop, verify, support validation, document, deploy and maintain data analysis, reports and interactive dashboards in accordance with prevailing quality, security and data protection standards. Support data analysts less proficient in dashboard development in the achievement of their dashboard product deployments and maintenance, including support to resp. supervision of the respective processed from a technical quality point of view. Recommend and support the evolution of the underlying data warehouse and its infrastructure. DESIRED PROFILE Bachelor degree with a specialisation on data warehouse analytics and visualisation in a business intelligence context, or equivalent Applicants must be from an EU member state TECHNICAL/PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATION 5 years of practical professional experience of the staff offered with building appealing dashboards with Tableau. 5 years of practical professional experience of the staff offered with IT product development, deployment and maintenance. 3 years of practical professional experience of the staff offered with accessing and data mining large-scale data sets and data warehouses. 3 years of practical professional experience of the staff offered with IT quality aspects of change management, configuration management, risk assessment, verification, validation, documentation, data quality monitoring, personal data protection, and data lineage. OTHER REQUIREMENTS (PERSONAL CHARACTERISTICS) Autonomous, investigative, mature, social, patient Desire to work in a multi-cultural team Good team worker, positive and open minded, committed to getting a job done Hands-on approach. About Eurocontrol and MUAC The European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation, commonly known as Eurocontrol, is an international organisation working to achieve safe and seamless air traffic management across Europe. Founded in 1960, Eurocontrol currently has 41 member states and is headquartered in Brussels, Belgium. EUROCONTROL‘s mission is to harmonise and integrate air navigation services in Europe, aiming at the creation of a uniform air traffic management (ATM) system for civil and military Users, in order to achieve the safe, secure, orderly, expeditious and economic flow of traffic throughout Europe, while minimising adverse environmental impact. Contractduur 12 maanden Job Types: Full-time, Temporary, Contract Salary: €4,900.00 - €6,000.00 per month Work Remotely: Temporarily due to COVID-19 COVID-19 Precaution(s): Remote interview process Personal protective equipment provided or required Plastic shield at work stations Social distancing guidelines in place Virtual meetings Sanitizing, disinfecting, or cleaning procedures in place

title: Data Analyst
summary: Custom visualisation, intuitive navigation with scheduled refresh with data sets, report sharing, enable self-service and streamline data consumption.
description: Data Analyst / Netherlands / 6 months / Start ASAP  Skills:  A business intelligence (BI/Data Warehousing) developer with extensive experience with primarily PowerBI, and secondarily with bi-tools such as Qlikview/ QlikSense or Cognos. An academic working and thinking level and at least an HBO diploma in Software Engineering, Computer Science or comparable. Technical knowledge of the combination of Google Cloud Platform and MS Azure Cloud Platform is a plus. Affinity with the primary processes of retail and trade organisations (logistics) is a plus. Used to work with applications like JIRA/Confluence  Both Back- and front-end BI development:  Power BI integration: Setup of Power BI in coherence with Data framework (Google Cloud) for analytics capabilities and guarantee availability of data and insights. Create datasets and load datamarts. Power BI Dashboard development and support of self service: Design, Development, deployment and maintenance of captivating dashboards with custom visualisation, intuitive navigation with scheduled refresh with data sets, report sharing, enable self-service and streamline data consumption.

title: Data Engineering Team Lead
summary:
Exposure to real time data ingestion / streaming data sources.
Working knowledge of data governance principles (e.g. data profiling, data cataloguing, managing…
description: As a Data Engineering Team Lead for CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology. You’ll lead a team of experienced Data Engineers, Scientists and Analysts in delivering client facing projects. You’ll continually hone your technical skills in a varied consulting role, acting as a 'Player/Coach' for the Data Team.  You’ll be a point of call for technical decisions and leadership, alongside line management responsibilities for a team of talented data specialists with varying levels of experience.  You'll develop a specialism in Google Cloud data tools, and will partner with Google and customer-side engineers to deliver innovative projects.  Your focus will be on the delivery of your work, rather than when or where you do it. You’ll be remote based primarily, but will be welcome to visit the offices as often as you like. You may also spend some time working from customer sites from time to time.  If you have a solid data engineering background, great communication skills and a passion for providing a great service for customers, this job would be a great opportunity for you.  What you’ll do:  Enable diverse organisations use Google cloud, and other supporting solutions like Looker, to solve complex data challenges. Meet with customers, potentially at the early sales stage, to assess and understand their technical requirements. You’ll guide projects from the information and discovery stages through to implementation, build and support. Coordinate project resourcing with other areas of the business, ensuring the right people are in the right place with the right skills. Gain exposure to a wide variety of technologies and data approaches, and you will be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available. Understand the value of our long relationship with Google, and help to grow and promote our data capabilities within their teams. Lead and inspire an experienced team of data engineers and scientists, working with them on their skills, personal development and career growth.  Key Technical Skills:  Significant commercial experience using languages like Java or Python In depth experience of common big data software stacks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, MapReduce, Apache Beam or Apache Airflow) A solid grounding working with common data modelling techniques and SQL (e.g. MS SQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL) Working knowledge of data governance principles (e.g. data profiling, data cataloguing, managing access controls, etc.) A passion for all things programming, databases, data, big and small Experience using Git and related tooling  Desirable Skills:  Experience with or knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (e.g. Pub/Sub, Dataflow, BigQuery, Firestore, etc.) Experience with or knowledge of AWS (e.g. Athena, EMR, Glue, Redshift, Kinesis, etc) or Azure (e.g. Synapse, Databricks, Data Factory, Event Hub, etc.) Exposure to real time data ingestion / streaming data sources Experienced in using unit testing and CI / CD Experience in or knowledge of working in an agile project based environment Bachelor or Masters degree in Computer Science, Data Science or equivalent education  Location:  We have offices in Central Manchester and Utrecht, with options for regular remote working. This role could also be remote based in the UK or Netherlands, with occasional travel to CTS offices and customer sites (post-Covid).  What you’ll get:  In addition to the competitive salary, you’ll get a high spec laptop and company contributed pension as standard.  You’ll be invited to the annual international company ‘kick off’ conference, which is a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don’t see everyday.  So what’s next?  Contact me directly at nick.bain@cloudsolutions.co.uk for more info.

title: Security Analist
summary: Daarnaast voert de Security Analist periodieke analyses en controles uit op de beschikbare data om daarmee mogelijke dreigingen en risico’s in kaart te brengen.
description: Ben jij een (startende of schoolverlatende) IT’er met ambitie om je te ontwikkelen tot security specialist of wil je jezelf als security specialist verder ontwikkelen? Lees dan verder! Wij breiden ons security team uit met een Security Analist. We bieden een werkomgeving waar we jouw ontwikkeling zeer serieus nemen en daar ook in willen investeren. Hoe ziet de uitdaging eruit? De Security Analist vervult een belangrijke rol binnen de security dienstverlening van Promax. Deze is werkzaam binnen ons eigen Security Operations Center (SOC) met projecten of voert opdrachten uit bij klanten. Bewaken & analyseren informatieveiligheid De Security Analist houdt zich bezig met het bewaken en analyseren van de informatieveiligheid van onze klanten en is nauw betrokken bij het inrichten en beheren van de hiervoor gebruikte platformen. Ons doel hierbij is om onze klanten maximaal te ontzorgen en te begeleiden in een constant proces voor het verbeteren van de informatieveiligheid. Signaleringen opvolgen Binnen het SOC volgt de Security Analist signaleringen op vanuit de gebruikte monitoring platformen en voert hierbij zelfstandig een eerste analyse en onderzoek uit. Hij wordt hierbij ondersteund door collega analisten of productspecialisten vanuit andere disciplines binnen de organisatie. Daarnaast voert de Security Analist periodieke analyses en controles uit op de beschikbare data om daarmee mogelijke dreigingen en risico’s in kaart te brengen. De uitkomst wordt in de vorm van (verbeter)adviezen aangeboden aan de klant of de eigen organisatie. Inrichten & beheren Gezamenlijk met de collega analisten wordt deelgenomen aan interne en externe projecten. Interne projecten richten zich op het (door)ontwikkelen van onze dienstverlening. Bij externe projecten participeert de Security Analist in projecten die in opdracht van de klant worden uitgevoerd. De werkzaamheden variëren van het implementeren van preventieve beveiligingsmaatregelen tot het optimaliseren en weerbaarder maken van bestaande systemen. Hiermee bieden we zeer gevarieerde werkzaamheden met uitgebreide mogelijkheden om jezelf te ontwikkelen tot een breed georiënteerde security specialist. Welke ervaring en competenties heb je voor deze functie nodig? Een relevante (onafgeronde) HBO opleiding of 2-3 jaar werkervaring binnen het ICT vakgebied met relevante vakinhoudelijke certificaten; Basiskennis van TCP/IP & Networking; Basiskennis van Windows en Linux besturingssystemen; Basiskennis Scripting & Programming; Goede communicatieve en schriftelijke vaardigheden in zowel Nederlandse als Engels; Kennis of ervaring met normenkaders zoals ISO27001 en NEN7510 zijn een pré; Kennis van digitaal forensisch onderzoek is een pré; VOG Verklaring bij aanvang dienstverband (wij vragen deze aan). Gevraagde competenties Enthousiast; Leergierig; Analytisch; Klantgericht/dienstverlenend; Kwaliteitsgericht; Zelfstandig & flexibel; Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden; Assertief. Wat bieden wij jou? Binnen ons team krijg je een opleiding tot Security Analist en kun je doorgroeien tot Senior Security Analist of Security Consultant. Inwerktraject Na een inwerktraject waarin we je vertrouwd maken met alle handelingen en activiteiten binnen ons team, gaan we op zoek naar aanvullende uitdagingen voor jou door je in te zetten op langer lopende trajecten bij onze opdrachtgevers. Eén ding staat voorop, jouw ontwikkeling tot een allround security specialist. Omdat jouw kennis voor ons een belangrijke sleutel is, zijn we bereid hier flink in te investeren. Je krijgt van ons ruimte om je kennis op niveau te brengen op diverse manieren. Binnen onze organisatie is veel kennis aanwezig en we geven je de ruimte om hier gebruik van te maken en jezelf hieraan op te kunnen trekken. We zoeken dan ook enthousiaste collega’s die bereid zijn flink in zichzelf te investeren en die ambitie hebben om door te groeien tot een echte specialist. Daar stellen wij een leuke en sociale werkomgeving tegenover met goede arbeidsvoorwaarden en een marktconforme beloning. Doing business with friends Promax is een bedrijf om trots op te zijn. Met kwaliteit en ambitie om een eindresultaat te behalen waar de klant blij mee is. Een bedrijf waar we elkaar als mensen laten groeien door in elkaar te investeren en te leren en evalueren als er zaken beter moeten. Een bedrijf waar we vooral ook plezier willen hebben in wat we doen en met wie we dat doen. Een grap, samen lunchen, tafelvoetbal spelen, een barbecue op z’n tijd. Maar altijd streven we met z’n allen naar de hoogste vorm van kwaliteit, we dagen elkaar daarin uit en staan altijd open voor verbetering. Enthousiast over deze vacature en ons bedrijf? Ga jij deze uitdaging met ons aan, dan maken we graag op korte termijn kennis met je! Voor meer informatie over deze functie kun je terecht bij onze collega Leon Jansen op 088-70 70 707. We ontvangen je cv en motivatie graag via hr@promax.nl.  Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld.

title: BI Data Analist - Architect
description: BI Data Analist ISRA48727 Organisatie Onze klant is een informele organisatie in de handel. Binnen de organisatie wordt er de afgelopen jaren steeds meer gefocust op datamanagement, om op die manier de business beter te kunnen dienen. Om deze reden zijn zij momenteel bezig met het oprichten van een Business Intelligence competence center. Het competence center bestaat uit verschillende afdelingen die samen een virtueel team vormen, denk aan de afdelingen Finance, Data Analyse en IT De IT-afdeling bestaat uit Business Analisten, Architecten en een Service Delivery Manager. Momenteel zijn ze bezig om het BI-team vorm te geven en zij zullen het IT-team vertegenwoordigen in het BI competence center. Momenteel zijn ze op zoek naar ervaren BI'ers die met hun enthousiasme en leergierigheid willen meebouwen aan het dataplatform. Het platform wordt ontwikkeld door een leverancier. Als BI Analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor het maken van functionele- en technische ontwerpen, het aansturen van de leverancier en ben je het aanspreekpunt binnen het team voor vragen omtrent specifieke domeinkennis of systeemexpertise. Taken Lid van Agile/Scrum team; Opleveren van realistische en uitvoerbare technisch en functioneel ontwerpen; Opleveren van systeemwijzigingen met gewenste functionaliteit; Bijdragen aan verdere opbouw datamodel; Aansturen en afstemmen met externe partijen inzake contract en geplande wijzigingen; Adviseren over optimale functionele en technische wijzigingen; Regie houden op opdrachten die uitbesteedt zijn aan externe partijen; Uitvoeren en participeren in projecten, vanuit eigen discipline/vakgebied; Rol van (data) architect kunnen vervullen. Eisen HBO+ werk- en denkniveau; Minimaal afgeronde HBO opleiding richting Informatica/Business Intelligence; Minimaal 2 tot 5 jaar relevante werkervaring als BI Data Analist - Architect in een Business Intelligence/ Datamanagement omgeving; Minimaal 2 tot 5 jaar relevante werkervaring in functionele en technische analyse; Relevante ervaring met werken conform Agile/Scrum; Kennis van MS BI / Azure / PowerBI / Python; Bekendheid met software security; Kennis van en ervaring met werken onder data-architectuur is een pré. Arbeidsvoorwaarden Vakantiegeld: 8,33% van bruto jaarsalaris; Vakantiedagen: 25 + 1/2 dag per kwartaal als je niet ziek bent; Reiskosten: 19 cent/kilometer (maximum van € 200,- per maand); Ziektekosten: € 50,- per maand tegemoetkoming; Opleidingsmogelijkheden. Salarisindicatie €3.500 - €6.000 per maand op basis van een 40-urige werkweek. Over iSense iSense is een jonge, energieke en ambitieuze specialist in de ICT arbeidsbemiddeling. iSense helpt je bij het vinden van een baan op operatie, business consultancy en (project/lijn) management niveau. Een baan waarin je succesvol kunt zijn en vooral ook gelukkig. Samenwerken met iSense betekent voor jou: Persoonlijke begeleiding voor, tijdens en na jouw sollicitatietraject; Goed inzicht in jouw persoonlijke vaardigheden door diverse rapportages; Klaargestoomd worden voor jouw sollicitatiegesprek; Altijd op de hoogte zijn van jouw sollicitatietraject; Maandelijks persoonlijk contact met de Field Coach; Ieder kwartaal gratis deelnemen aan de Personal Development Workshops. Meer weten? Kijk op www.isense.nl. Locatie Middelburg Publicatiedatum 19.01.2021 Publicatie eindigt 19.04.2021

title: Performance App Tracking Specialist
summary:
You perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data quality of the app marketing workflow.
You'll perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data…
description: Fancy the task of supercharging our App marketing strategy? Think you can decipher the data and perfect our implementations? Enjoy being part of an ambitious, cutting-edge team in our HQ in Amsterdam? Then you could be the App Tracking Specialist we're looking for… Our story (the bitesize version) We've grown from an attic start-up to become Just Eat Takeaway, a global food delivery powerhouse. With customers across 24 countries, we take millions of orders every day from Amsterdam to Auckland! What you'll do as a Performance App Tracking Specialist: Our measurement specialists are the experts at capturing all relevant data with a high accuracy in a GDPR compliant way., using a wide range of tools, platforms and strategies. This position is a varied role packed with exciting challenges. Data skills are a key part of this role. It's your job to help us in setting up, implementing and maintenance of App tracking and platform connections. You'll perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data quality of the app marketing workflow while working closely with our App Developers. You will implement and maintain our performance marketing app tracking setups. You perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data quality of the app marketing workflow. You co-develop and manage the app channel tracking strategy with the rest of the team. Maintain and further improve Universal / App Linking and App Deep Linking efforts. You perform campaign analyses and review and resolve current ad fraud detection and prevention efforts. Keep a close eye on new market developments; IOS14, SDK features, GDPR. You work closely with our App Development team. Your profile You have at least 2-3 years working experience as App Analyst, App Marketing or App Tracking specialist. You have the ability to collaborate with technical and non-technical teams. You're an expert in using Adjust, Firebase & GTM. You have a good understanding of Google Analytics, DV360, SA360, Facebook, mobile remarketing partners, SQL and dashboarding software like Tableau. You know exactly how data is gathered, processed by the different tools and are strong in deriving actionable insights. You know how to find improvement points and troubleshoot tracking implementations on App applications. A basic level of knowledge regarding specialisms (SEA, SEO, Display, App, Affiliate, etc) and related tools and technologies. You relish working in a team and enjoy collaborating and sharing knowledge with your peers You have a sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company's success You are a critical thinker with outstanding problem-solving skills Knowledge of BigQuery or CDP/DMP implementation is a nice to have Our offer The freedom to go where no one in our company has gone before; Possibilities to strengthen your skills and grow in the role; Work in a fast-growing company; Being part of a young, professional and international team; A competitive salary; Custom workstations/laptops (Mac/Linux/PC); Opportunity to join native language courses; Traveling between the different office locations Awesome company events; Free drinks and fruits.

title: Associate Engagement Principal
summary:
The Associate Engagement Principal is part of the Aera team that helps create and deploy data-enabled Cognitive Skills.
1-2 years of customer facing experience.
description: At Aera, we deliver the cognitive technology that enables the Self-Driving Enterprise™: a Cognitive Operating System™ that connects you with your business and autonomously orchestrates your operations. Aera's Cognitive OS leverages the best of artificial intelligence, machine learning, natural language processing, big data, and enterprise domain expertise to deliver Cognitive Automation at scale for some of the world's largest companies. We are looking for Engagement Principals to work with our customers to realize this vision.  The Associate Engagement Principal is part of the Aera team that helps create and deploy data-enabled Cognitive Skills. Skills provide real-time insight, recommendations and predictions. Aera Skills communicate with users and enterprise systems to execute decisions.  Key responsibilities of the Associate Engagement Principal (AEP) are to translate business requirements into functional requirements and to help with the day-to-day activities of running a software engagement. As such, the AEP works closely with Aera customers as well as internal Aera stakeholders such as Client Partners (CP), Solution Architects (SA) and Skill Builders (SB) to implement Aera’s skills at customers. The AEP brings a broad range of skills including supply chain domain knowledge, business acumen, functional and some technical skills, as well as software project management experience. Responsibilities Understand customers’ business requirements and high-level design ideas Map As-Is processes and, more importantly, document the To-Be processes to be delivered with the Aera platform Translate the customers’ business requirements into detailed functional requirements and document them in a detailed functional design document Support the Solution Architect when drafting the detailed technical requirements and detailed technical specifications Identify test scenarios and provide support for documenting the test scripts Work closely with the SA and Delivery team to test and troubleshoot the Aera solution Provide support for user acceptance testing and releases into production Prepare, conduct and support training for customers Support the project management including monitoring of deliverables and ensuring timely completion of projects Create project documentation Conduct meetings and presentations with customers and internal Aera stakeholders Report the project status to Customer and internal Aera stakeholders on a regular cadence Escalate risks and issues to the EP when needed About You 3-5 years of business analyst experience including requirements gathering, detailed solution design, project management, and testing in the area of supply chain management Experience with deploying enterprise IT and software, such as ERP (Oracle and SAP SD/MM/PP), BI, supply chain planning systems and/or execution systems Cloud/SaaS experience Experience with agile project work/scrum methodologies Bachelor's Degree in Supply Chain or Engineering Strong oral and written communication skills 1-2 years of customer facing experience Ability to travel within region At Aera, we're on a mission to solve the biggest, most intractable challenges in the world of enterprise software. We envision the rise of the Self-Driving Enterprise: a more autonomously functioning business with a central operating system that connects and orchestrates business operations. Our Cognitive Operating System is increasingly used by the world's largest companies to fundamentally transform their organizations and how work is done.  If you share our passion for building the next generation of enterprise software, and deploying it for the most sophisticated customers in the world, you’ve met your match. Headquartered in Mountain View, California, we're growing fast, with teams in Mountain View and San Francisco (California), Bucharest and Cluj-Napoca (Romania), Paris (France), Munich (Germany), London (UK), Pune and Bangalore (India), Sydney (Australia) and Singapore. So join us, and let’s build the future of work together!

title: Digital Strategy Consultant (DigitalBCG)
summary:
In a corporate role focused on technology/digital initiatives (e.g. business analyst);
Big data & advanced analytics, Strategy, Technology & digital,…
description: Location: Amsterdam Geography: Europe & The Middle East Capabilities: Big data & advanced analytics, Strategy, Technology & digital, Transformation and BCG TURN Industries: Automotive & Mobility, Biopharmaceuticals, Consumer products, Energy & environment, Engineered products & infrastructure, Financial institutions, Health care payers & providers, Insurance, Media & entertainment, Medical devices & technology, Metals & mining, Process industries & building materials, Public sector, Retail, Technology industries, Telecommunications, Transportation, travel & tourism Who We Are Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.  To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures—and business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.   Digital BCG BCG has a long history of driving growth by embracing innovation and new ways of thinking. Through DigitalBCG, we bring together a diverse mix of consultants and digital specialists to ensure that we are supporting our clients throughout their digital transformation journeys. We work with our clients to fully understand the impact of digital on their business and set priorities that will transform their vision into value. Whether it be developing new technologies to support their core business, making better use of their data, or pursuing entirely new sources of revenue, our aim is to achieve radical improvements in productivity, flexibility, and speed. We are innovating how our clients are using artificial intelligence, robotic process automation, internet of things, personalization, blockchain technologies, and more to gain competitive advantage.  DigitalBCG encompasses a broad set of data, digital, and technology capabilities from BCG consulting teams and practices, along with our business units such as BCG Digital Ventures, BCG Platinion, and BCG GAMMA. Practice Area Profile BCG’s Technology Advantage (TA) practice focuses on helping clients deliver competitive advantage and business superior performance through the use of data, technology and digital. TA is the fastest growing practice at BCG and at the heart of the strategic impact we have with our clients. Our consultants and experts globally work across all industries and provide deep experience and expertise across a number of topics including: * Digital Transformation * Data & Digital Platforms * Software & Agile * Digitizing the Tech Function What You'll Do Our world is being driven by digital and at BCG we are at the heart of it. In DigitalBCG, you would use your expertise and generalist consulting skillset to help CEOs and their teams solve their most pressing challenges, and think about how digital and technology will change the shape of their business.  You would help your clients answer questions such as “How will AI disrupt my business model?”, “How can businesses use data and analytics to create highly-personalized outreach delivered through a seamless omnichannel experience?”, “How can I ship higher quality digital services to my customers faster by using agile?” and much more.  As a member of our team, you would work on a variety of these topics, applying your consulting skills to strategic digital, technology, and digital transformation questions.  As a Consultant, you will be given end-to-end responsibility for the larger and more complex “modules” within a BCG project, and begin to develop specialized knowledge to help you solve our clients’ problems. You’ll work closely with clients to understand their issues, create strategies for change, win buy-in for your recommendations, and collaborate with fellow BCGers to transform client potential into performance.  A broad skillset and passion for digital & technology is important. As part of our digitally-focused consulting team, you would work on a variety of digital topics, applying generalist consulting skills to strategic digital & technology questions. You will be supported by an extensive training curriculum (the same programme as all BCG consultants), plus digital-specific training and mentoring to help you build your skills. What You'll Bring (Experience & Qualifications) We’re looking for exceptional talent from consulting or industry to join us. You would typically: Have a minimum of 4 years’ experience working: with a leading consulting firm (focused on technology/digital initiatives); in a corporate role focused on technology/digital initiatives (e.g. business analyst); in a tech start-up leadership role; or in a "consulting-like" industry (e.g. digital strategy, digital marketing) Have an outstanding academic track record from a leading university Have excellent verbal and written communication skills in Dutch and English Who You'll Work With Our consultants within DigitalBCG are an integral part of BCG's core consulting team; we work side-by-side with all practice areas to create value & competitive advantage for our clients.  We offer multiple career paths for the world’s best talent to have a real impact on business and society. As part of our team, you will benefit from the breadth and diversity of what we are doing today and where we are headed next. We count on your authenticity, exceptional work, and strong integrity. In return, we are committed to supporting you in discovering the most fulfilling career journey possible—and unlocking your potential to advance the world. TO JOIN US All candidates must complete an online application to be considered. Date Posted: 01-Jan-2020 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws. BCG is an E-Verify Employer.

title: Data analyst Credit Risk
summary:
You’ll develop the principles for creating data sets that meet the latest internal and regulatory requirements for data quality.
A thorough mastery of SQL.
description: Data Analyst (5 FTE). Rabobank is a cooperative bank with over 8,5 million customers. Through large and small initiatives, the bank wants to make the world a little bit better. They support local enterprises and larger non-profit organisations and thus contribute to the welfare and prosperity of the community. What is your job as a Data Analyst? You have the freedom to choose the path that leads to the solution. As a Data Analyst you’ll need to ensure that the request matches the needs and assess whether the data sets are fit for purpose. You will translate requests for data from the monitoring and back-testing team directly into code or adequately instruct developers on how to do so. You’ll develop the principles for creating data sets that meet the latest internal and regulatory requirements for data quality. If you have enough experience, you will also play the role of advisor and leader. As a Senior you’ll need to have the skills and personality to get the most out of your team and guide them towards the goals you have agreed to achieve In addition, it's important that you recognise everything in the checklist below: A Master degree in Economics, Finance, or quantitative field (mathematics, physics or similar) Strong communication skills in English, both spoken and written A background in banking An understanding of credit risk modelling; At least 2 years’ experience in writing database queries and merging, cleaning and processing data A thorough mastery of SQL The ability to present solutions and provide clear documentation of all steps, so that data sets are not only useable, but sustainable For senior level: Proficiency in leading small teams to achieve agreed objectives together. Important information: 1. SQL and Credit Risk are both important, a candidate who has specific knowledge of SQL, but has not yet done an assignment with a bank in the area of credit risk or has no knowledge of it, will not be able to contribute sufficiently. 2. We are not looking for someone with a lot of banking knowledge, but only limited SQL skills. Making complex queries in SQL is a MUST-HAVE. We work with large and diverse data files - with a relatively low data quality - which can raise many questions, from which we have to link attributes. 3. The Rabobank is looking for candidates who could preferably start in January-early February. 4. The department's need for growth is due to the planned size of the projects for 2021. One of the projects that is going to start and that requires capacity - is the data collection for the redevelopment of one of the existing models for prediction of loss risks in the business portfolio. The Rabobank is also in need of additional or replacement capacity in a number of other projects. Additional information: - Language: the candidate should speak Dutch and English fluently. - Pre-employment screening: If the candidate can start at the client, a Pre-employment screening will be performed. - MUST-HAVES: Knowledge of the Banking and Finance industry and SQL. Speciale condities: Voor deze aanvraag gelden specifieke inwerkvoorwaarden en BYOD (Bring Your Own Device). Indien u niet bekend bent met deze voorwaarden, vragen wij u, alvorens aan te bieden op deze aanvraag, informatie in te winnen bij ons. Projectduur Start: zsm Eind: 30 juni (verlenging mogelijk) Uren: 36/week Standplaats: Utrecht Code: 0115m2 ZZP: Nee, Inzet gebeurt via tijdelijk dienstverband voor de duur van de opdracht. Uw Reactie: Als u aan bovenstaande eisen voldoet* dan ontvangen wij van u graag vóór de hierboven aangegeven sluitingsdatum: · Een chronologisch CV (.word) · Motivatie gericht op dit project (maximaal 2000 tekens) · Uw uurtarief (inclusief reis- en verblijfkosten en ex BTW) · Uw mogelijke startdatum en eventuele vakantieplannen * Wij merken vaak dat deskundigen aan nagenoeg alle eisen voldoen, maar net dat ene certificaat missen. Als voorbeeld: u werkt al jaren volgens de Agile of Scrum methodiek of volgens Prince, maar U hebt nooit het certificaat behaald. In principe zou u dan niet in aanmerking komen. Wij hebben voor u de oplossing: onze opleidingsdivisie kan er voor zorgen dat u in zeer korte tijd over dit certificaat beschikt. Wij kunnen dat – ook individueel – tegen zeer scherpe tarieven COVID-proof aanbieden. Interesse? Reageer dan op de aanvraag en vermeld dat u meer info wil. Wij verwachten van u exclusiviteit om te voorkomen dat u meerdere malen op dit project bij onze opdrachtgever wordt aangeboden. Mochten wij van uw aanbod geen gebruik maken dan zullen wij u hierover uiteraard zoveel mogelijk nader informeren. In algemene zin geldt dat als binnen twee dagen na de uiterste aanbiedingsdatum geen reactie is gegeven, een beter passend profiel is geselecteerd. KIJK VOOR DE MEEST RECENTE PROJECTEN EN VACATURES OP: http://bit.ly/OKE4Ujobs Contractduur 4 maanden Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, Tijdelijk Werkschema: ma-vr Ervaring: writing database queries +merging, cleaning, processing data: 3 jaar (Vereist) Thuiswerken: Tijdelijk vanwege COVID-19

title: Local Trainer
summary:
Maintain and update required analytical data.
You will support the development and monitoring of key data to drive a positive customer experience, focused on…
description: Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 155,000 employees who are committed to safe, responsible and sustainable ways to nourish the world. This position is in Cargill’s food ingredients and bio-industrial business, where we anticipate trends around taste, nutrition and safety to innovate and provide solutions to manufacturers, retailers and foodservice companies.  JOB PURPOSE AND IMPACT  The Business and Training Analyst II will be responsible for project management, coordination and continuous improvement for an assigned region or team. In this role, you will provide specialized knowledge within processes, systems and strategies. You will support the development and monitoring of key data to drive a positive customer experience, focused on accuracy, efficiency, productivity and internal controls and ensure teams have the knowledge to deliver excellent results.  KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES  Develop and deploy best practices across location and promote continuous improvement through consultation with teams.  Participate in project design, monitoring project progress, providing solutions to variances, handling project documents, developing communication and training plans, and delivering communication and training across the nation.  Maintain and update required analytical data.  Assist in the development and execution of a consistent and sustainable approach for onboarding and training on end to end administrative processes including necessary system functionality.  Ensure procedures, process maps and user guides are current, accurate and maintained.  Independently solve moderately complex issues with minimal supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff.  Other duties as assigned  MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS  Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent experience  Confirmed data analysis skills  Knowledge of training systems and methodologies  Experience planning, monitoring and managing projects from initiation to completion  Experience anticipating issues, problem solving and implementing solutions and improving efficiency, quality, cost and productivity  Minimum of two years of related work experience  PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS  Knowledge and direct experience with related database systems  Fluent in English and Dutch  OUR OFFER  In return for your expertise and commitment, we will provide a fast paced stimulating international environment, which will stretch your abilities and channel your talents. We also offer competitive salary and benefits combined with outstanding career development opportunities in one of the largest and most solid private companies in the world.  Interested? Then make sure to send us your CV and cover letter in English today.  Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cargill  Cargill is committed to being an inclusive employer. Click here to find out more https://careers.cargill.com/diversity/

title: Expert Data Scientist
summary:
As a data scientist you are on the forefront driving business results by generating data-based insights.
Close collaboration with data engineers and analysts to…
description: Are you inspired to contribute to and have an impact on solving real-world, big mobility problems of today and tomorrow? As a Senior Data Scientist in Bridgestone Data Solutions & Innovation, you will work on real products, data-based insights, leveraging and exploring hundreds of million data points, such as vehicle telemetry, fleet and driver’s behaviour as well as various mobility and telematic data.  Being a member of a cross functional team, including data scientists, data engineers, software developers and product managers, you will be responsible for building up and maintaining a steady inflow of data and making sure that exploration as well as productization of data opportunities will materialize as part of our Line of Business Data Solutions and Innovations. Here’s a little taste of your challenge: As a data scientist you are on the forefront driving business results by generating data-based insights. Data mining and data analyses to generate new insights and open new business opportunities, ensuring the availability of ground truth data with the stakeholder support. Designing a data driven / machine learning product from the bottom up. This includes defining the project goals and understanding the customer problem/journey, carving out the necessary KPIs together with stakeholders, constructing a training/validation and test set, pre-processing the data, employing a machine learning model, and bringing it into production via micro services. Proposing and steering our short- and long-term efforts to exploit new data types and sources, both internally and externally. Coordinate model implementation, monitor and refine launched products Close collaboration with data engineers and analysts to build products and to grow our customer base. Who are you? There is no set route to become our new Data Scientist. But to be successful in this role, this is the kind of profile we have in mind: You have at least 4 years’ experience in building statistical models, manipulating data sets and made significant contributions to several product launches. You can utilize all kinds of data sources, such as relational databases via SQL, non-relational databases, and any kind of web interface providing structured and unstructured data in json, xml, or any other common data format. Personal must-haves: strong problem-solving skills, analytic mind, achievement orientation, sense of quality, flexible thinking and good communication skills. You are a self-driven team player with entrepreneurial touch and a passion for results. You have profound knowledge and experience with Python or any other object-oriented programming language. You have a deeper understanding and already applied various unsupervised-learning techniques, such as k-mean, Gaussian mixture models, DBSCAN, self-organized maps, or autoencoders, as well as in standard supervised learning techniques like regression, random forests, naive Bayes. In addition you have already designed deep learning models in Keras or PyTorch. You were able to gain insight into and experience with the following frameworks, standards, and software categories: Spark, Azure, or similar. You have experience visualizing and presenting data utilizing Power BI, Tableau, matplotlib, or Plotly. What can you expect? An adventure in software product development within a rapidly growing business unit of a globally renowned brand and various opportunities for your professional development. Being part of a team of professional and passionate developers, contributing to building and adapting the technology for our Webfleet Solutions Service Platform. Brilliant minds. Learn from your colleagues – pioneers and experts who are changing the world Different cultures. Our employees come from all over the world, with 55 nationalities and counting Practically Speaking, what's in it for you: Competitive salary. Benefits package in addition to the salary: Retirement and disability pension Life and accident insurance Flexible holiday plan. Birthday off! Plenty of formal training for new joiners + access to LinkedIn Learning. Who are we? The Data Solutions & Innovation is one of our Line of Business within the newly created Business Unit “Bridgestone Mobility Solutions”, headquartered in Amsterdam, and belonging to Webfleet Solutions, a Bridgestone company. This new Business Unit and the Data Solutions & Innovation line of business is forming the core of new digital driven business assets to support Bridgestone on its way of the digital transformation from the world leading tire and rubber company to a brilliant Mobility Solution Provider. Webfleet Solutions is one of the world’s leading telematics solution providers, dedicated to fleet management, vehicle telematics and connected car services. Its main Software-as-a-Service solution WEBFLEET is used by businesses of all sizes to improve vehicle performance, save fuel, support drivers and increase overall fleet efficiency.
